title: ‘Crisis? What Crisis?’: Visma-Lease a Bike Bullish Over Crash-Blasted Season and Tour de France Uncertainty
content:
Team boss Richard Plugge beats back notion the wheels are falling off during a season of 'super teams' and crashes from Vingegaard, Van Aert.

Read the full article at ‘Crisis? What Crisis?’: Visma-Lease a Bike Bullish Over Crash-Blasted Season and Tour de France Uncertainty on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
